com.compendium.core.db
Class DBReferenceNode

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.DBReferenceNode

public class DBReferenceNode
extends java.lang.Object

The DBReferenceNode class serves as the interface layer to the ReferenceNode table in the database

Author:
Rema Natarajan / Michelle Bachler

setReference

public static boolean setReference(DBConnection dbcon,
                                   java.lang.String sNodeID,
                                   java.lang.String sSource,
                                   java.lang.String sImage,
                                   java.util.Date dModificationDate,
                                   java.lang.String sLastModAuthor,
                                   java.lang.String sUserID)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
Inserts a new reference in the table and returns true if successful.

Parameters:
dbcon, - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sNodeID - the id of the node to insert the reference fo.
sSourceID - the source path of the reference.
sImage - the image path of the external image for the node.
dModificationDate - java.util.Date, the modification date for this reference record.
sLastModAuthor - the author name of the person who made this modification.
sUserID - the id of the current user logged in.
Returns:
boolean, true if it was successful, else false.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getIRIS

public static void getIRIS(DBConnection dbcon,
                           java.lang.String sNodeID,
                           NodeSummary node)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
Populates the Image, Reference, and ImageSize fields of the given Node object. This is done simply as a performance optimization to do this operation using one MySQL call instead of three. This operation is done very frequently as maps are being built (opened), and hence this optimization speeds map opening considerably.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
sNodeID - the id of the node to get the information for.
NodeSummary - node - the node object into which to store the results
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getAllSources

public static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getAllSources(DBConnection dbcon)
                                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
Gets a unique list of all the references (files only) and images and background images in the database and a count of their use.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
Returns:
a unique list of all the reference paths and image paths as Strings (Hashtable - File->use count).
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getAllSourcesUnique

public static java.util.Vector getAllSourcesUnique(DBConnection dbcon)
                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
Gets a unique list of all the references, images and background images in the database.

Parameters:
DBConnection - dbcon com.compendium.core.db.management.DBConnection, the DBConnection object to access the database with.
Returns:
Vector, a unique list of all the reference paths and image paths as Strings.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException

getNodesForSource

public static java.util.Vector<NodeSummary> getNodesForSource(DBConnection dbcon,
                                                              java.lang.String source,
                                                              java.lang.String sUserID)
                                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
Gets a list of all nodes that use the given source for a ref, image or background.

Parameters:
dbcon - the DBConnection object to access the database with.
source - the source to return the nodes for.
Returns:
a unique list of the node using the given source.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
